item.title: First Blog Post
item.description: This is my very first blog post. Please read my statement on having a blog and sharing my thoughts.

item.title: MAA 2024 AMC 8 Leaks Need to be Investigated
item.description: The 2024 AMC 8 was leaked. I think that MAA needs to investigate this and protect the integrity of the competition.

item.title: MathCounts 2024
item.description: I placed 9th out of ~300 people in my Chapter and captained my school this year in MathCounts. It was a well-planned and great event this year.

item.title: Science Bowl 2024
item.description: My experiences participating in and captaining my school to 2nd Place at the 2024 NJ MS Science Bowl! We had a great time at PPPL this year!

item.title: BRCSs First Year
item.description: My thoughts on being a co-founder and the Bridgewater-Raritan Computer Science Clubs wonderful inaugural year.

item.title: RidgeHacks 2024
item.description: We won 2nd Place overall out of 22 teams at RidgeHacks 2024 with our HTML, CSS, and Flask application named Graze.

item.title: Po-Shen Lohs Math Talk
item.description: Reflections on hearing Professor Po-Shen Lohs talk about mathematics, competitions, and AIs role in math.

item.title: 2024 NHL Playoffs
item.description: Live Blog of the 2024 National Hockey League Stanley Cup Playoffs.

item.title: MontyHacks VII
item.description: My journey and experiences at MontyHacks VII building the HTML and CSS for our Flask application named Blaze.

item.title: Logistem Science Challenger
item.description: After 3 long years, I finally became the Grand Champion in the highest division of Logistem's prestigious annual Science Challenger!
